title: Weather Dashboard
description: Create a weather dashboard application that displays current weather conditions and forecasts for multiple locations. Users should be able to search for locations and save their favorite cities.
features: Search for locations by city name or zip code
Display current weather conditions (temperature, humidity, wind speed, etc.)
Automatic location detection based on user's IP
additionalContext: The dashboard should have a modern, clean interface with weather-appropriate visuals (sunny background for clear days, animated rain for rainy days, etc.). Focus on making the information easy to read at a glance while providing detailed data when needed.
